channel.title: I need your ban appeals
channel.description:
Hi guys, over the past few days I'v been re-making an old project of mine, a website containing an archive of submitted ban appeals to Jagex and I need some ideas for appeals, or ones you've previously sent in.
I'm looking for serious appeals that could get an account unbanned and funny appeals which (I'm guessing) will be the main attraction of the site.
Funny appeals will be submitted to Jagex from my "No hope of being unbanned" accounts (eg. Level 3 accounts with 90 mining that stayed online regulary for 100 hours straight) or banned accounts users have submitted.
I'm also in need of any throw-away accounts that have been banned for various reasons (I'v only got banned accounts for macroing) and haven't previously sent in appeals to test some of the different serious appeals. Chances are most of them won't be unbanned which is why I don't want your level 100 account that was banned for swearing.
A few things to remember: - You can swear. Nothing on the site will be censored. - Be original, google is swarming with appeals that all sound the same. "I'll sue you", "I'll commit suiside", "I'm sorry, I won't do it again" ect. - All appeals must be 400 characters, including spaces, or less (This is the limit set by Jagex for an appeal) - If (in the unlikely event) any appeal is accepted from an account submitted you will recieve your account back untouched.
Look forward to seeing how creative this community can be ;)
-Note: I have already found a few appeals in this forum which have been posted on the website, credits to the author and a link back to the original page are displayed within the appeal and an additional link back to moparisthebest.com has been added to my links page.
Site is live - http://rsba.co.nr

@norrisemoe wrote:

as said before Gary, that no longer works, sorry.

item.title: I need your ban appeals

item.description:
@gary_coleman wrote:

say you’re going to kill yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your ban appeals
item.dc:creator: @norrisemoe norrisemoe
item.description:
@norrisemoe wrote:

Jagex I would just like to let you know I am tracking where this message goes and I am going to personally slit the wrists, which will disable you as you bleed to death, of whom so ever reads this UNLESS you unban me within 2 minutes of it.
Yours sincerly,
(insert name)

Note: good English, proper grammar and also try to avoid your real name(legal reasons)

Read full topic

item.title: I need your ban appeals
item.dc:creator: @poor_noob poor noob
item.description:
@poor_noob wrote:

My friends main got banned over a year ago for autoing, then recently i told him about the last chance appeal and he wrote a really good one.1 month later it got unbanned.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your ban appeals
item.dc:creator: @Terkoiz Terkoiz
item.description:
@Terkoiz wrote:

Search moparscape for a SCAR quickban program, ive seen a couple. itll help =p

Read full topic

item.title: I need your ban appeals
item.dc:creator: @Kulkka Kulkka
item.description:
@Kulkka wrote:

FFS JAGEX FUCKING UNBAN [name here] OR I KILL U MOTHERFUCKERS ALL I DID I JUST SAID NOOB TO A NOOB FFS UR A PIECE OF SHIT CUZ U BANNED ME!

Heh,that got me permanent ban instead of 3 day ban…

Read full topic

item.title: I need your ban appeals
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Hello, Jagex Thanks for the last appeal! I’m almost 99% sure you won’t unban
me but why not take a chance? Anyways yes I did deserve the ban… Well Ive recently made a new account or two with no black marks or mutes or anything. But having [acc name here] back would be great. I can’t exactly say much more but I changed alot. But if you don’t unban me I would like to say again, I’m sorry for what I did.
-[initials here]

Read full topic

item.title: I need your ban appeals
item.dc:creator: @Whiskey Whiskey
item.description:
@Whiskey wrote:

d33 You’ve made what, over $10,000 USD from selling Mills xD Your all loaded from RSC xD You wont know me, but I have bought mills from you before

Anyhoo, good idea you got going. Sorry #i have no banned accounts.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your ban appeals
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“the7thdot, post:3, topic:60161”]LOL one thing that Runescape auto-appeals to is if you say “Suicide” or “kill myself” and such keywords like that They’ll unban you in like 2 second ^_^[/quote] that dosent work anymore i heard
